ATTACHMENT ID: 12805794 - PreCommit-HIVE-MASTER-Build

Don't think the test failures are related. This time the other test in TestConverters timed out which leads me to think the machines are extremely slow.
Uploading a new patch for jenkins with the timeout increased.

Committing this. The test failures were caused by too many executors on a single node. Have verified that the test which the patch touches succeeds locally.
